Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Lament and Departure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Nan's initial disillusionment and her interaction at the saloon, culminating in her abrupt departure. It establishes Nan's character, her romantic desires, and her initial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Lament
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her dissatisfaction with her life in a saloon setting to an unseen listener, contrasting her dreams with reality.

sub_scenes.title: Departure from Saloon
sub_scenes.description: Nan abruptly leaves the saloon after a skeptical response, indicating unresolved feelings and a shift in location.

Major_Arcs.title: Ghost Town Demolition and Initial Reaction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the ghost town setting and the impending threat of its demolition for airport construction, focusing on the initial reactions and emotional impact of this news.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival and Announcement
sub_scenes.description: Men arrive at the ghost town and discuss plans for airport construction, revealing the town's fate.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Shifting Understanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Nan and Cal's evolving conversation, moving from initial misjudgments and romantic uncertainty to deeper emotional expressions amidst the backdrop of the ghost town's impending destruction.

sub_scenes.title: Misjudgment and Self-Deprecation
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss romantic feelings and misjudgments, revealing Cal's self-deprecating view of romance.

sub_scenes.title: Demolition Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the ghost town demolition site where Nan confronts demolition workers, expressing her resistance and distress.

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflict and Emotional Distress
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Nan's conflict with her father regarding business and helping with construction, leading to emotional distress and seeking comfort.

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Horse Request
sub_scenes.description: Nan interrupts her father's business meeting to discuss horses for construction work, leading to a dismissal.

sub_scenes.title: Mother's Comfort and Decision
sub_scenes.description: Nan seeks comfort from her mother and decides to seek clarity from Cal regarding their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation and Separation with Cal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Nan's pursuit of Cal, their escalating conflict about horses and relationship expectations, and their eventual separation.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Father's Directive
sub_scenes.description: Nan pursues Cal, but is interrupted by her father with business instructions, setting up a conflict between personal desires and family obligations.

Major_Arcs.title: Loneliness, Return, and Reconciliation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Nan's period of loneliness after Cal's departure, his eventual return, and their emotional reconciliation and confession.

sub_scenes.title: Loneliness and Longing
sub_scenes.description: Nan experiences loneliness in Cal's absence, reflecting on her feelings after their separation.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a severe weather crisis, detailing its impact on the community and Cal's decisive action to help, showcasing broader community concerns and resilience.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Report and Community Worry
sub_scenes.description: Characters discuss the severity of the weather and its threat to cattlemen, expressing worry and seeking information.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report
Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation
Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Hopelessness and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: Despair over the relentless snow is broken by the arrival of a plane dropping fodder, bringing hope and relief to the community.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery
Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Chane Benson's Arrival and Town Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Chane Benson and his disruptive presence in town, focusing on the town's divided reactions and the escalating tensions surrounding him.

sub_scenes.title: Street Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's violent act in town sparks varied reactions and gossip among townspeople, setting up his controversial character.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions
Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary
Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult
Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior
Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around Clyde's article criticizing Benson, the ensuing controversy, and Benson's calculated response and threats, highlighting the power of the press and personal danger.

sub_scenes.title: Article's Fallout and Sally's Fear
sub_scenes.description: Clyde's article causes immediate backlash, leading to Sally's fear for Clyde's safety and Benson's reaction.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Deception and Violent Climax
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the deceptive dinner invitation to Benson, escalating tensions, and culminating in violence and Sally's emotional outburst.

sub_scenes.title: Deceptive Politeness and Rising Tension
sub_scenes.description: A superficially polite dinner with Benson masks underlying tensions and hidden motives, leading to escalating conflicts.

Major_Arcs.title: Brother Revelation and Chase
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc covers Sally's revelation about Benson being her brother, the subsequent confrontation, and the chase to save Clyde from Benson's threat.

sub_scenes.title: Brotherly Revelation and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Sally reveals Benson is her brother to Jeff, leading to a tense confrontation between Benson and Jeff.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde
Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the confrontation between Jeff and Benson, Er's intervention, and the eventual resolution of the conflict, emphasizing the power of words and community.

sub_scenes.title: Non-Violent Resolution and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Er proposes a non-violent resolution, leading to a fistfight and ultimately Clyde's safety and Benson's departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint
Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde
Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change
Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Tensions and Betsy's Leadership
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new conflict related to range wars and Betsy's assertive role in managing ranch tensions and relationships.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and New Boss
sub_scenes.description: A whip fight and the introduction of Steve Daley as the new boss signal new tensions and power dynamics at the ranch.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Skepticism and Range War Warning
sub_scenes.description: Betsy expresses skepticism about Hank's judgment and is warned about a potential range war, highlighting the ranch's precarious situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Betsy's confrontation with Fred Bridges in town escalates to a physical fight, highlighting the growing conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Evolving Relationship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Betsy's shifting perception of Steve Daley, from seeing him as a bodyguard to a romantic interest, and the central conflict of his gunfighter identity.

sub_scenes.title: Realization and Job Offer
sub_scenes.description: Betsy realizes Steve is a hired gunman and decides to keep him, leading to discussions about his role and her changing feelings.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley
Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks
Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity
Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity
Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love
Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Escalation and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the escalation of the range war tensions, Betsy's assertive stance, and the eventual resolution through confrontation and understanding.

sub_scenes.title: Threat of Range War and Betsy's Defiance
sub_scenes.description: The threat of range war looms, and Betsy asserts her dominance and sets rules, preparing for conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity
Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement
The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Drama and Romantic Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new ranch setting, introducing new characters and conflicts around range troubles and evolving romantic interests, leading to a proposal.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Conflict and Curley's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A personal argument is interrupted by the arrival of Curley, signaling new range trouble and shifting the focus to ranch business.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation
Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love
Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal

Major_Arcs.title: Carlton Contract and Carrie's Triumph
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the Carlton contract, Fred's manipulative intentions, Carrie's confrontation, and her ultimate business and personal triumph.

sub_scenes.title: Fred's Deceptive Proposition
sub_scenes.description: Fred proposes a business deal with selfish motives, revealing his manipulative nature to Carrie.

narrative_arcs.title: Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction
The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal
Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred
The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Dave's Uncertain Future
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the aftermath of Carrie's triumph, focusing on her and Dave's encounter, their confessions, and the ambiguity of their romantic future.

sub_scenes.title: Town Encounter and Confessions
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave meet in town, leading to confessions of regret and love, and Dave's abrupt departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection
Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil
Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk and Rance's Escape and Love
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dirk's escape, his injury, and the complex relationship between Dirk and Rance, culminating in their reunion and romantic resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Escape and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's escape is complicated by pursuit, leading to a confrontation and injury.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch
Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition
Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush
Decision to Leave the Marshal and Reflection

Major_Arcs.title: Rance's Recovery and Wedding Day
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Rance's recovery after being wounded, his reunion with Chris, and their eventual wedding, bringing the story to a romantic conclusion.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery and Reassurance
sub_scenes.description: Rance is found unconscious and recovers under Chris and her father's care, leading to reassurance and mutual concern.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease
Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival
Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate
Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
